name: Can of Wormé
description:
Done in 48 hours at the Global Game Jam 2021. The theme: "Lost and Found". In this retro 90s FPS shooter, you have lost 20 worms from an extremely large Can of Worms. You alone must now collect and can your lost worms that have dispersed throughout the abstract and strange canning factory.

Instructions:

You must find, collect, and return 20 worms to a large can in this action shooter. Get searching!

Story:

You are the hero working at a particularly nondescript and abstract canning factory. The facility has a large can of worms that has suddenly broken open. Now all the worms are lost in the facility! It is on you, the sole hero and apparently only person working at this place, to find and capture all the worms and put them back into the can. One at a time. There are twenty. Can you refill the Can of Wormé?

Credits:

Can of Wormé

by David Newel and Adam Dayton

Coding: Adam Dayton
Additional Art: David Newel
Level design: David Newel and Adam Dayton

One of those rare mods made explicitly for FreeDoom. The provided zip requires no external resources. Just unzip and run the included "PLAY CAN OF WORMS.bat" file
